data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 24302, Version Hash: a73365b032a8dd92d137444dc8e27cfa22e94570
data.actual_result: The italicized description/title in the richembed is cut off on the right side.
data.expected_result: The message is supposed to be fully shown without anything clipping or cut off on the side.
data.short_description: In bot sent embeds, italicized titles and descriptions get cut off at the very end.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a Discord RichEmbed in a bot - Set the title/description - Italicize the title/description by adding "*" around the phrase - Make the bot send the RichEmbed
